full_text: Constructive exchange of views with @AJCGlobal this evening, covering recent developments in the MEPP, Irish participation in peacekeeping in the Middle East and Ireland-Israel relationship.

@SteveAikenUUP @allianceparty @SDLP @JP_Biz Steve the best way to avoid tariffs is to get a future trade deal agreed in the weeks ahead. That should be the focus, not trying to undo clear commitments in an agreed Withdrawal Treaty.
